title: How did the invention of the videotape impact society? - Quora

response.answer_text: Although it is conceivable that live video without recording or post-production would have as many viewers for the same length of time, videotape (which I translate as video recording generally) caused people to watch about 5 or 6 hours of media a day, replacing about 20% of human experience (33% of awake time) with other people’s lives and concerns. So, videotape has replaced about 1/3 of human consciousness with some variety of entertainment. That is very big.
